settings.text: Vitamin C: The Spark of Collagen Synthesis

Amongst all it's well known benefits; Vitamin C is the ideal catalyst for collagen synthesis within the body. It is the only vitamin that can fast-track this crucial step, leading to the creation of collagen -the structural protein that your body relies on for its vitality. The Collagen + C Bundle works with your body to promote collagen production, organ health , radiant skin, and noticeable health benefits.

settings.heading: Vitamin C
settings.description: Vitamin C is an essential vitamin, meaning it is not naturally produced in your body. It is a vital antioxidant that plays a key role in boosting your immunity and lowering the risk of heart disease, iron deficiency, and high blood pressure.

settings.heading: Collagen
settings.description: Collagen is the foundation of well-being, responsible for joint health, skin elasticity, and overall tissue vitality.

settings.heading: The Collagen + C Bundle
settings.description: A bundle designed to work with your body in achieving optimal health. Both of these supplements have a range of benefits individually. When taken together they work in harmony to bring you a wider range of benefits that you can both see and feel.

settings.text: In the journey toward well-being, these two components work in harmony to bring you a host of benefits that span health, beauty, and vitality. The Collagen + C Bundle works with your body to promote sustainable collagen production, contributing to the overall health of your entire body.

• Boosts Immunity: Vitamin C is a potent antioxidant that enhances immune function, aiding in the prevention and treatment of infections, free radicals and protecting against chronic diseases
  • Promotes Healthy Hair, Nail & Skin: As a cofactor for collagen production, Vitamin C promotes healthy skin, hair, and nail growth.
  • Skin Elasticity: It helps maintain skin elasticity and reduces the signs of aging by supporting collagen production.
  • Increased Mobility and Joint Health: Collagen supplements can alleviate joint pain and improve mobility in individuals with osteoarthritis.
  •  Bone Density: Collagen aids in preserving bone density and reducing the risk of osteoporosis.
  •  Boosts Immunity: Vitamin C is a potent antioxidant that enhances immune function, aiding in the prevention and treatment of infections.
  • Scar Healing : Colvita collagen provides structural support during tissue repair and therefore, assists in the body's natural wound-healing mechanisms.

A high-quality vitamin C that is bio-organic and 100% natural. Derived from germinating seeds of buckwheat and bitter orange - These two plants are considered extremely valuable natural sources of vitamin C due to their high bioavailability and excellent flavonoids links. Colvita Vitamin C is currently one of the most natural vitamin C supplements.

settings.slide_description: Helping Restore New Energy and a Radiant Youthful Feeling.

Physical Activity and Recovery: Colvita supports tissue regeneration, reduces inflammation, and relieves joint pain. It's a workout companion that metabolizes protein, helping build muscle mass. It's also instrumental in post-injury and post-surgery rehabilitation.Organ & Skin Health: Internally, Colvita optimizes your metabolism and aids internal organ function, promoting the health of the liver, kidneys, heart, and gut. On the surface, it bestows radiant skin, reduces wrinkles, dark spots, and acne scars, and promotes healthy hair growth.

Our Colvita Collagen supplement is available source of natural wellness; Containing Pure Marine Tropocollagen, Algae (fucus vesiculosus) extract, Tocotrienols, and Vitamin E. The star of Colvita is the lyophilized Native Collagen Hydrate, obtained through a cutting-edge extraction process that maintains its triple helix structure, closely resembling human collagen.

settings.slide_subheading: AM: 1 Colvita Capsule + Vitamin C Capsule PM: 1 Colvita Capsule. Take for 4 months consistently to begin seeing and feeling results. Intended for adult use only.
